title: Sampler, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, paper
Technique: embroidered on net
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: Twenty-seven patterns embroidered on hexagonal double-ply mesh in small squares; three squares not filled in. Mounted on red paper.
